short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the news from Wikipedia when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"News in New Tab" displays "Topics in the News" from Wikipedia's Current Events page whenever you open a new tab without losing the focus on the URL bar.

You can easily catch up on the latest news at a glance in a beautiful user interface, keeping you informed without interrupting your workflow!

The extension runs entirely within your browser, making requests only to Wikipedia for current event updates.
